LanguageData.NonSkarniteOrReviaSacrificing: Pawn is neither Skarnite nor a Revia
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeRejected: {0}'s offering was accepted, but deemed insufficient. The bloody goddess demands more blood.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSacrificeSuccess: The sacrifice was found worthy, and {0} has grown stronger.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceOfferingStart: {0} offers some {1}s to the bloody goddess.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceOfferingInvalidPawn: The bloody goddess spurns the unitiated's plea.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceOfferingMaxLevel: {0} is already at the height of {1} power!
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSettingsEnableRandomSoulReapTie: Assign random Soul Reap tier on spawn
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSettingsBloodthirstDaysToEmpty: Number of days for bloodthirst to fully empty
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSettingsSoulReapSpawnAgeCurve: Randomise Soul Reap level based on pawn age
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSettingsSoulReapSpawnRange: Possible Soul Reap levels on spawn
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSanctifyNonReviaNonSkarnite: The rune does not respond in the hands of infidels.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSanctifyAlreadySanctified: The weapon is already blessed with a bloodthirsty spirit.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSanctifyDescPart: A bloodthirsty spirit inhabits this weapon, granting the faithful of Skarne health in exchange for spilled blood.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceOldSoulreapBlessing: Allow for manual, non-ritual, offerings for Soul Reap levels
LanguageData.RequireReviaGene: Require any Revia gene for conversion ritual
